original_text: “One who is faithful in a very little is also faithful in much, and one who is dishonest in a very little is also dishonest in much.
korean_text: 지극히 작은 것에 충성된 자는 큰 것에도 충성되고 지극히 작은 것에 불의한 자는 큰 것에도 불의하니라

sentences.original_text: One who is faithful in a very little
and one who is dishonest in a very little
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 아주 작은 것에 불성실한 사람은
